relation: Santa Claus Hides in your Phonograph
Why Don't Santa Claus Go Next Door?
Hector Grant, Herbert Payne, Walter Miller & Johnny Wakefield
pageTitle: The Antique Phonograph Music Program: Playlist for December 22, 2009
textAfterTable: Listener comments!   Thu. 12/24/09 8:07pm Michael and Elizabeth Koenig: Thanks to you and Ed Fararro for a wonderful Christmas program. We've been listening to your programs now for several years via podcast, out here in sunny California. Merry Christmas! Enable Javascript for more options!
